content:
5 Today, the last penny will be minted. posted 1 hour ago by rdvs34283 2 comments award share report block The Patriot Oasis™ @ThePatriotOasis • 9h 🚨BREAKING: IT'S OFFICIAL: The US Mint will officially STOP minting pennies. Today, the LAST Penny will be minted! One Penny Costs the U.S Taxpayer $0.37 cents to Mint. U.S. Mint lost $85,300,000,000 BILLION minting pennies in FY2024 alone.
